scripts.dev_js: export NODE_PATH=./node_modules; parcel watch {{ project_name }}/src/js/{{ project_name }}.js --dist-dir {{ project_name }}/static/js/ --public-url ./
scripts.build_js: export NODE_ENV=production;export NODE_PATH=./node_modules; parcel build {{ project_name }}/src/js/{{ project_name }}.js --dist-dir {{ project_name }}/static/js/ --public-url ./
scripts.dev_css: export NODE_PATH=./node_modules;npx postcss {{ project_name }}/src/css/{{ project_name }}.css -o {{ project_name }}/static/css/{{ project_name }}.css --watch
scripts.build_css: export NODE_ENV=production;export NODE_PATH=./node_modules;npx postcss {{ project_name }}/src/css/{{ project_name }}.css -o {{ project_name }}/static/css/{{ project_name }}.css
